## GetOptions type

Options for get()

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type GetOptions = {
    collection_path?: string;
};
```

## Remarks

- collection\_path: If set, specified directories are omitted from the a filepath in a document id. See [Collection](./git-documentdb.collection.md)<!-- -->.
